summary: A small, secluded island off the coast of Belize suddenly finds itself terrorized by a deadly predator from the planet's distant past when deep sea divers accidentally awaken an ancient evil.
cast: Brian Krause|Anne McDaniels|Steven Helmkamp|Candice Nunes|Berne Velasquez|Gildon Roland|Pulu Lightburn|Remo|Phillip Coc|Serapio Chun|Paul Hyde|Joe Requena|Aaron Lauriano|Chase Kilburn|Trey Schesser|Curlin King|Jody Adolphus|Garrett Brawith|Benjamin Easterday|Kelcey Watson|Alex Bell|Andre Ajibade|Jennifer Marshall|Robert Rexx|Melissa Johnston|Kelli Reifschneider|Jessica Mathis
title: Poseidon Rex
